name: Hypervisor
body:
### Hypervisor for ARM systems.
A simple, bespoke hypervisor for ARM systems supporting hardware virtualisation extensions. Currently only targeting the Cubietruck (Cubieboard 3) ARM board, featuring an Allwinner A20 SoC (dual core Cortex-A7).

### Repository
To check out the project, run the following:

```
$ git clone https://github.com/james-johns/hypervisor/
```

### Branching model
The branching model used by this repository is similar to the 'successful git branching model' presented by nvie (http://nvie.com/posts/a-successful-git-branching-model/).

**master** - Represents the current stable release. Releases are tagged as appropriate.
**development** - Represents the current project state in development. This is the only branch to be merged into master
**feature/\*** - A feature currently in development. Feature branches are branched from and merged back into the development branch.

### Authors and Contributors
Project created in 2014 by James Johns (@james-johns).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
